g.text: Estimated term frequency within the selected topic

a.text: 1. saliency(term w) = frequency(w) * [sum_t p(t | w) * log(p(t | w)/p(t))] for topics t; see Chuang et. al (2012)
2. relevance(term w | topic t) = λ * p(w | t) + (1 - λ) * p(w | t)/p(w); see Sievert & Shirley (2014)

g.text: Top-30 Most Relevant Terms for Topic 1 (27.6% of tokens)
